jathiya namathi mandiraya dambau gadolin nowa, yugayatama pawathina dawunu gadolin godanangannata nam, swakiya chinthanaye abhimanayama awashya bawa, guru parapura wisin pasak kala yutha mohotha elambaa aththeya.

janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mathiniya loka rajya nayaka aaryawange samuluwa amathayi.dubayihi ikuth 22 wanida pawathi loka balashakthi samuluwa amathimata mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma dubayi rajyaya bala diwayinen pitathwa giye ikuth 21 wanidaya.janadhipathithuma samanga janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mathiniya, widesha katayuthu amathi mahacharya ji. el. piris, widulibala ha balashakthi niyojya amathi pe්ramalal jayasekara, janadhipathi upadeshaka parlimenthu manthri sachin was gunawardhana, basnahira palath sabha manthri nawufar fawusi, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga yana mahathwaru da sahabhagi wuha.loka balashakthi samuluwe di mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumata da ema samuluwa amathimata awasthawa salasi thibuni.aasiyanu ratawal wisin athwindinu labana balashakthi sampath uunathawa aarthika sanwardhanaya kara yana aasiyathika ratawala idiri gamanata balawath badhawak bawa da mehidi penwa dun janadhipathithuma sadharana wuth sama se bedi yanna wuth aakarayen balashakthi sampath hawule bhukthi windime di sanwardhanaya wemin pawathna ratawala apekshawan saha himikam pilibandawa wisheshayen salaka baliya yuthu bawa da janadhipathithuma mehidi penwa dunneya.dubayi hi pawathi loka balashakthi samuluwata sahabhagi wu rajya nayakayo samuha chayarupayakata peni siti ayuru.dubayi hi shri lankikayan hamuwu awasthawamema samuluwe elambauna thiranaya anuwa sama wasarakama okthobar 22 wani dina loka balashakthi dinaya lesa samarima yojana karini.

aanduwen iwathwana bawa pawasana ema amathi pirisa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya shakthimath kirima sandaha janadhipathiwarayagen mehidi thanathuruda labagath bawa dayasiri jayasekara mahatha pawasiya.

eeta passe eya eyata labunu upadesa handuna gena ee upades wala thiyana de karanawa eeta passe eelanga upadesa me widiyata digatama karagena yanawa.aththatama me athishayinma sarala pahadilikirimak pamanayi.me gana hadarimata thawath boho karunu athibawa mathaka thaba ganna.oba boho wita samanya ayi.si gana dannawa athi mewa thula yam kisi karyayak kirima sandaha wisheshayen salasum karanalada paripathayak thiyenawa.mema ayi.si bohowita nirmanaya kara thibenne nishchitha pradanayak(input) labadun wita salasuma anuwa nishchitha prathidanayak(awutput) laba dimayi.mewaye salasuma anuwa yam karyayak sandaha salasum karanalada ayi.si ekak bhawitha kirimata hakiwanne patu parasayaka katayuthu sandaha pamanayi.namuth ayi.si ekak salasum karana lada karyayen pita bhawitha kala nohaki yayi min adahas wenne na.udaharanayak lesa 4017 kiyana ayi si eka el.ee.di walin wisithuru nirmana kirimata bahulawa yoda gannawa.

me nisa eksath rajadhaniyata yam paduwak wuna kiyala kiyawenawa. 2007 wasaredi engalantha agamathi godan brawun wisin yuropa sangamaye thiranathmaka sakachchawak ha giwisumak magahariya.pasuwa ohu wisin giwisuma athsan kalath, thiranathmaka dinaya magaharima ha emagin siduwu paduwa gana brawunta wiwechana aawa.
loka banku samuhaye wadasatahan sandaha anumatha aakarayanta anuwa ha hawulkara sanwidhana samanga samipa sambandhikaranayath athuluwa karyalaya mangin pradarshanaya prawardhanaya kerenu atha.
me puranokthiya lankawe wyaptha wu kala wakawanuwa nishchithawa kiwa nohaki wuwada mewayehi prabhawaya kri.wa. 8-14 siyawas wala dakunu indiyawe siduwu bawa anawaranaya kala hakiya.

oon ohomayi walawwata paya thiyapu kodukarige kathandare...

eseth nomathi nam oba kamathi deyak obata genenna denawa wiya haki ewani awasthawaladi ohuta katapura sthuthiyak karanna eyin ohu sathutu wenawa noanumanayi .
